Name: Morningstar
Text: Spins around you, use timing to aim!

Name: Fireball
Text: Hold to charge up the spell.

Name: Beetlerang
Text: A throwing-beetle that wiggles as it moves.

Name: MantisClaw
Text: A mantis foreleg as an improvised sickle.

Name: Axe
Text: A short axe you can throw.

Name: Francisca
Text: A lighter axe for throwing farther.

Name: Gorgonhead
Text: Chance to inflict Poison or Petrify!
